title: Rehabilitation of the Wildlife Research and Training Centre at Girithale
decision_details:
- The proposed renovation activities of the Wildlife Research and Training Centre at Girithale has been planned to be implemented under the Eco System Conservation and Management Project, and the duration of the said project is due to be finalized by 2021‑06‑30. It has been observed that, if the proposed renovation activities are implemented as one project, it is not possible to complete the relevant construction activities before the due date of finalization of the project. 

	As such, the concurrence of the Cabinet was granted for the proposal made by the Minister of Environment and Wildlife Resources to carry out the relevant rehabilitation activities after calling for bids as 03 procurements under the 03 main components namely renovation of the existing education and administrative buildings of Wildlife Research and Training Centre at Girithale as  a Research Centre, renovation of the hostel building with modern facilities and construction of the Academic Complex.
